page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT AROUND RAMSBOTTOM
page.content: The pattern of{employment}in the smaller towns around Ramsbottom is very different to that in Ramsbottom itself. People who live in Hawkshaw, Greenmount, Holcombe Brook and Summerseat tend not to work in these towns themselves. They are mainly {commuters,}working in Manchester, Bolton and Bury. The area has a good transport network e.g. the M.66, and this facilitates easy movement within the area. These smaller settlements around Ramsbottom experience a large {outflow}of traffic in the morning between 8 and 9, and an{inflow}between 4 and 6. Most of the workers are {service workers,}many with firms cars. There are very few employment opportunities within the towns themselves but they do not suffer an {unemployment}problem.
